com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess
Interface ImageHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageCopier
public interface ImageHandler

A PreProcessor invokes the same ImageHandler to process all the images contained in all the documents being preprocessed. However, an ImageHandler is invoked only for images having an URL which is relative to the document being preprocessed, not for image having an absolute URL.

A basic ImageHandler may copy its image argument to a directory which is part of the deliverable. A more sophisticated ImageHandler may convert its image argument to a different format (example: convert a .svg image to .png).

Method Summary

Method Detail

parseParameters

void parseParameters(String parameters)
                     throws Exception
Parses specified parameter string.

Parameters:
parameters - parameter string having a syntax which is specific to this ImageHandler
Throws:
Exception - If for any reason this operation fails

reset

void reset()
           throws Exception
Reset the internal state of this ImageHandler. Invoked by the PreProcessor before a run. Allows the PreProcessor to reuse the same ImageHandler to process several documents.

Throws:
Exception

handleImage

String handleImage(URL imageURL,
                   File outDir,
                   Console console)
                   throws Exception
Process specified image.

Parameters:
imageURL - The URL of the image to be processed
outDir - The directory where the input image, as is or modified, is to be copied
console - Console on which progress, trace, debug, etc, message can be displayed. May be null.
Returns:
The properly escaped, relative to outDir, URL of the processed image.

Return null if default processing is to take place. The default processing does nothing at all and returns imageURL.toExternalForm(). This means that the deliverable will point to the images referenced in the source document.

Throws:
Exception - if, for any reason, this operation fails
